articles.author: Elaine Luria and Max Rose
articles.title: Why We Voted Against the War Powers Resolution
articles.description: Congress should be debating laws governing the use of force, not symbolic resolutions.
articles.content: While we respect our colleagues who serve our nation and supported this resolution, the debate Congress should have is not whether the president had the authority to carry out the Suleimani killing, but rather how we move forward as a governing body if we mus… [+1432 chars]
